sentences.english: Barite usually contain strontium and calcium.
The treatment with strontium ranelate reduces the risk of new fracture in vertebral and non-vertebral.
sentences.chinese: 雷奈酸锶可降低椎骨以及非椎骨新发骨折的危险性。

sentences.english: To investigate the influence of Sr2+ on the cytotoxicity of strontium substituted hydroxyapatite(Sr-HA).
sentences.chinese: 探讨掺锶对羟磷灰石细胞毒性的影响。

sentences.english: Iodine and strontium with a solution of water experiments have achieved the same results.
sentences.chinese: 用溶有碘和锶的水进行实验，也取得了同样的结果。

sentences.english: Objectve To observe the therapeutic effect for palmolantar warts with 90Sr.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察90锶敷贴治疗掌跖疣疗效。

sentences.english: Ye's group operates a strontium-based lattice clock.
sentences.chinese: 叶的团队研发了锶原子晶格钟。

sentences.english: Method Strontium 90 contact therapy was introduced among 26 infants with skin hemangiomas.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用90锶敷贴为26例小儿皮肤血管瘤治疗。

sentences.english: At present, sodium salt and strontium are commonly used modifier in practice.
sentences.chinese: 目前生产上所要用的变质剂主要是钠盐和锶。

sentences.english: Sorption of Sr, Cs on the attapulgite clays treated with modifier is especially notable under the alkali amd oxidative condition.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明凹凸棒石粘土对铯的吸附能力优于锶。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the synthesis route of strontium ranelate, an antiosteoporosis drug.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究雷尼酸锶的化学合成。

sentences.english: This paper was a review of current status of strontium ranelate.
sentences.chinese: 本文对雷奈酸锶的研究情况作一简要概述。

sentences.english: The alkaline-earth metal strontium is the smallest element in abundance for the silver-white soft metal.
sentences.chinese: 锶是碱土金属中丰度最小的元素，为银白色软金属。
